name: Mutants vs. The Chosen
description:
The future has brought destruction to some places on Earth. Some people are suffering from poverty, disease and visible genetic mutations.
Although the mutations are typically small, they are often used as a pretext to attack the Mutants by the Chosen. The gunmen steal, destroy and kill. This time, they have chosen a small village in the shadow of the ruined city, where Riam lives with his father and sister. Maybe it's time to stand up to the Chosen. Do it - in this point and click adventure game.

Features:
* free to play
* multilanguage (English, German, Czech (hra česky), Spanish, Portuguese, Russian, Chinese)
* classic point and click adventure game optimized for tablets and smartphones
* original from GameStylus.com team

Help: Use Menu to switch on/off sounds and music, to change language or to restart the game.
